channel.title: PLAYTEST: Naked City Blues - A Hard-Boiled/Noir Detective RPG
channel.description:
**PLAYTEST: Naked City Blues** ***Naked City Blues*** is an in-development Powered by the Apocalypse role-playing game that tells hard-boiled detective stories as seen through the lens of film noir. The game is also "Carved From Brindlewood," meaning that it shares many mechanics of *Brindlewood Bay* , including an emergent mystery structure. I'll send a copy of the latest version of the rules to players a few days before this session.
This is a four-part series, running Thursday nights in January (8:00 PM EST). Attendance in all sessions is encouraged, but not required: You must sign up for each individual session.
Sessions will run three hours. We will be using the GM's Zoom for video chat, a shared Character Keeper on Google Docs, and Roll Dice With Friends as a shared dice roller.
If all players agree, the session will be recorded and posted for public viewing.
**This series is a playtest. The game is very early in its development cycle.** While I hope that this will be a fun series in and of itself, I am primarily looking for honest feedback on the rules: I expect there to be rough edges and parts that don't work as intended. I also expect to make changes to the rules as needed during the course of the series.
**Safety Tools** : We will be using Open Door, the X-Card, and Lines & Veils. Lines & Veils will be collected anonymously. This game complies with the [Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html).
**Breaks:** We'll take a five-minute break near the top of each hour, plus any other breaks as requested.
[Session One](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MLudpdwTVLhxS0IC6z6): Thu Jan 7, 2021, 8:00 PM EST [Session Two](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MLudrTMrwWPbOSQbN3h): Thu Jan 14, 2021, 8:00 PM EST [Session Three](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MLudv84sJwsHLvZpKSh): Thu Jan 21, 2021, 8:00 PM EST [Session Four](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MLudwZqnedFMEjPlzg-): Thu Jan 28, 2021, 8:00 PM EST

item.dc:creator: @RDUNeil
item.description:
@RDUNeil wrote:

I’ll also be interested in how you handle the multiple character issue, since most Noir is tightly focused on a single (usually male) character who is defined by autonomy/independence and separation from society.

How that translates into multiple players who all want to be the protagonist… seems like a challenge.
